officeAddress: In front of Bole Printing Press, Hansem Office Park, 5-7th floor
companyIntro: For over a decade the Government of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia (FDRE) has invested heavily in the expansion and improvement of the construction services delivery and in modernization of the construction sector. The Government has been working hard on creation and management of physical infrastructure (asset) in construction sector.
aboutUsIntro: Construction Management Institute established by Council of Ministers Regulation No. 691/2010 states the objectives of the institute as to ensure effective implementation of the country’s short and long term construction programs and projects in terms of time finance and quality through building project management capacity of key actors of construction project implementers and thereby sustain the ongoing rapid development of the country.
visionContent: To see the countries’ construction project performance excellent by 2020.
missionContent: To ensure an effective implementation of the country’s short   and long term construction programs and projects in terms of time,   finance and quality through building, project management capacity of key actors of project implementers and thereby sustain the ongoing rapid development of the country.
valuesContent: Work continuously for sustainable result improvement

backgroundContent: Construction Management Institute established by Council of Ministers Regulation No. 691/2010 states the objectives of the institute as to ensure effective implementation of the country’s short and long term construction programs and projects in terms of time finance and quality through building project management capacity of key actors of construction project implementers and thereby sustain the ongoing rapid development of the country. For over a decade the Government of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia (FDRE) has invested heavily in the expansion and improvement of the construction services delivery and in modernization of the construction sector. The Government has been working hard on creation and management of physical infrastructure (asset) in construction sector. Information is a key tool for the construction industry development; information communication technology infrastructure is needed for successful implementation of the objectives of the institute. One of the infrastructure needed is the development of a website, which the institute wishes to procure to gather and distribute information to the participants and stakeholders of the construction industry.

whatWeDoContent: At Construction Management Institute, our primary goal is to deliver high-quality and secure services to our customers by providing a digital platform for comprehensive management of all your scaffolding work. We are dedicated to advancing the  construction industry through excellence.

aboutUsFooter: Construction Management Institute established by Council of Ministers Regulation No. 691/2010 states the objectives of the institute as to ensure effective implementation of the country’s short and long term construction programs and projects in terms of time finance.
lms_service_content: Our Learning Management System (LMS) is a software application for the administration, documentation, tracking, reporting, automation, and delivery of educational courses, training programs, or learning and development programs. The LMS provides a platform for learners to access learning materials, submit assignments, and communicate with instructors and peers. It also allows instructors to create and manage courses, track student progress, and assess student performance.
ems_service_content: Our Exam Management System (EMS) is a software application for the administration, documentation, tracking, reporting, automation, and delivery of exams and assessments. The EMS provides a platform for instructors to create and manage exams, track student performance, and generate reports. It also allows students to access exams, submit answers, and receive feedback on their performance.
